creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Carpet of dull gold colored cut velvet with large design of bats, lotus blossoms and leaves in red, gold threads and oyster white. Field bordered with Greek key meander. Main border of lotus blossoms and leaves; outer, wide border of Greek key meander. Made up of three widths of velvet seamed lengthwise. Lining of pale gold colored damask of cloud design.
title: Carpet
